channel.title: 2006Rewind - The Testing Phase
channel.description:
[size=2.65em]2006Rewind[/size] Welcome to 2006Rewind! 2006Rewind is a fairly new server, with an experienced owner whose sole purpose by its staff and development team is to replicate RuneScape exactly the way it was in the year 2006. 2006Rewind has more new content and bugs fixes which seperates us from other remakes. We will be hosting a testing phase which means the experience rate will be set at 10x. This will help us locate any bugs that are still currently in-game which will be patched. The testing phase is an important part of our server as we want to ensure the best gaming experience for players!
The testers will have a higher chance of gaining moderator status if they help out
Accounts will be reset when the test phase is over. This will happen only once!
Full website incl. the hiscores are being re-done and will be linked here as soon as possible. This is not our highest priority as of now.
Hiscores for now:http://2006rewind.no-ip.biz/2006rewind/hiscores/index.php Features! - Most bugs fixed - All skills except from farming! - This server is online 24/7. - 3* experience rate. (Test phase is 10x.) - No custom items or npc's. - Fantastic economy. - Friendly and approachable community and staff. - Stable server. - Webclient. - Working quests. - Active staff. - All free-to-play skills are working perfectly. - original gameframe. - Npc clipping base. - Npc dialogue. - Honest staff. - So much more, you wouldn't even believe it! Come check us out now, register your account here.
Working Quest List! F2P Quests: -Cooks Assistant -Imp Catcher -Sheep Shearer -Rune Mysteries -Doric's Quest -Vampire Slayer -Witch's Potion
Members Quests: -Lost City -Priest in Peril -Druidic Ritual -Fishing Content
Misc: 4.5k Npc Spawns Hiscores(2006 template) Global Ground Items Realistic NPC drops Report Abuse BanManager Canoe System Multi Barrage Music Shortcuts Shop Prices lowering when selling
Download Links : [url=http://uppit.com/8tajspwoj60k/2006Rewind.jar]Client[/url]
[img]http://i61.tinypic.com/kf4088.png[/img]

item.title: 2006Rewind - The Testing Phase
item.dc:creator: @Dragon_Noobs Dragon Noobs
item.description:
@Dragon_Noobs wrote:

[size=2.65em]2006Rewind[/size]
Welcome to 2006Rewind!
2006Rewind is a fairly new server, with an experienced owner whose sole purpose by its staff and development team is to replicate RuneScape exactly the way it was in the year 2006. 2006Rewind has more new content and bugs fixes which seperates us from other remakes. We will be hosting a testing phase which means the experience rate will be set at 10x. This will help us locate any bugs that are still currently in-game which will be patched. The testing phase is an important part of our server as we want to ensure the best gaming experience for players!

The testers will have a higher chance of gaining moderator status if they help out

Accounts will be reset when the test phase is over. This will happen only once!

Full website incl. the hiscores are being re-done and will be linked here as soon as possible. This is not our highest priority as of now.

Hiscores for now:http://2006rewind.no-ip.biz/2006rewind/hiscores/index.php
Features!

  • Most bugs fixed
  • All skills except from farming!
  • This server is online 24/7.
  • 3* experience rate. (Test phase is 10x.)
  • No custom items or npc’s.
  • Fantastic economy.
  • Friendly and approachable community and staff.
  • Stable server.
  • Webclient.
  • Working quests.
  • Active staff.
  • All free-to-play skills are working perfectly.
  • original gameframe.
  • Npc clipping base.
  • Npc dialogue.
  • Honest staff.
  • So much more, you wouldn’t even believe it! Come check us out now, register your account here.
